actions.text: Amendment SA 1031 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 138.

Amendment SA 1031 proposed by Senator Hagan. (consideration: CR S3817, S3819-3820; text: CR S3817) To authorize the use of the insurance fund to reduce fraud and maintain program integrity in the crop insurance program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1031 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 138.

purpose: To authorize the use of the insurance fund to reduce fraud and maintain program integrity in the crop insurance program.
